Text: reminderpst Dear Vince This is a kindly reminder for the recommendation letters for my academic faculty application There are total of schools that I am applying Four of them will contact you and ask for the recommendation letter only if they want to pursue further Prof Nau from Duke is one of them For the other seven schools they have asked for the recommendation letters at the first stage of the application process The deadline for these seven schools listed below is next Tuesday I do understand totally on how busy you are at this critical moment of our group For your convenient I have attached the old recommendation letter you gave me for my greencard application in August We can just use this letter if you agree Stanford Business School Please email Letters of Recommendation as either PDF files or MS Word documents to Stanford MSEng Production Operations Management Professor Hau Lee Department of Management Science Engineering Terman Engineering Center Room Stanford University Stanford CA Purdue IE Professor N Prabhu Chair Industrial Engineering Faculty Search Committee Grissom Hall Purdue University West Lafayette IN Northwestern IEMS Please send an electronic version to Prof Mark S Daskin at and please follow up with a signed original letter to him at Prof Mark S Daskin Chairman Faculty Recruiting Committee Department of Industrial Engineering and Management Sciences Northwestern University Evanston IL Stanford MSEng Information Science and Technology Chair of the IST Search Committee co Pat Emslie Search Coordinator Department of Management Science Engineering Terman Engineering Center Stanford University Stanford CA UC Berkley IEOR Search Committee Chair Department of Industrial Engineering Operations Research University of California Etcheverry Hall Berkeley CA Telephone FAX Cornell ORIE Faculty Search Committee School of ORIE Rhodes Hall Cornell University Ithaca NY Thank you very much Vince I really appreciate it Chonawee Vinceletdoc

summay letters of recommendationpst Hi Vince Thank you again for being my reference If you remember you wrote one letter for me already for my greencard application So you might want to refer to it to save your time Here is the list of schools that I am applying Northwestern IEMS UC Berkley IEOR Stanford MSEng Information Science and Technology Stanford MSEng Production Operations Management Princeton ORFE Cornell ORIE UofWisconsin Madison IE Purdue IE UT Austin ORIE and business schools U of Michigan Business school Stanford Business school University Of California Berkeley Business school Duke Fuqua Some schools will contact you directly for the reference letter There are seven schools however that we need to send the reference letters to them Please send them at your earliest convenient I am truly sorry for this rush I was busy on job searching to find a new company to sponsor my visa so I did not have time to prepare the academic applications Deadline ASAP Please send the reference letter at your earliest convenient Stanford Business School Please email Letters of Recommendation as either PDF files or MS Word documents to Stanford MSEng Production Operations Management Professor Hau Lee Department of Management Science Engineering Terman Engineering Center Room Stanford University Stanford CA Purdue IE Professor N Prabhu Chair Industrial Engineering Faculty Search Committee Grissom Hall Purdue University West Lafayette IN Northwestern IEMS Prof Mark S Daskin Chairman Faculty Recruiting Committee Department of Industrial Engineering and Management Sciences Northwestern University Evanston IL Deadline Stanford MSEng Information Science and Technology Chair of the IST Search Committee co Pat Emslie Search Coordinator Department of Management Science Engineering Terman Engineering Center Stanford University Stanford CA UC Berkley IEOR Search Committee Chair Department of Industrial Engineering Operations Research University of California Etcheverry Hall Berkeley CA Telephone FAX Cornell ORIE Faculty Search Committee School of ORIE Rhodes Hall Cornell University Ithaca NY Thank you very much Vince I really appreciate it Chonawee
